00037 /*
00038  * Parameter.h
00039  *
00040  *
00041  *
00042  *  Created on: 14-May-2010
00043  *      
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef PARAMETER_H_
00047 #define PARAMETER_H_
00048 
00049 #include <string>
00050 
00051 using namespace std;
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * A class to represent the various parameters like
00055  * the dirichlet conjugate weights and such
00056  *
00057  * Can be vector valued parameters
00058  *
00059  * This class additionally stores the sum and provides
00060  * functionality to dump to and initialize from disk
00061  */
00062 typedef struct Parameter {
00063     int length;
00064     double* values;
00065     double sum;
00066 
00067     Parameter();
00068     Parameter(const Parameter &param);
00069     virtual ~Parameter();
00070 
00071     Parameter& operator=(const Parameter &param);
00072     virtual void dump(string fname);
00073     virtual void initialize_from_dump(string fname);
00074     virtual void initialize_from_values(int length_, const double* values_,
00075             float sum_);
00076 } param;
00077 
00078 #endif /* PARAMETER_H_ */
